text:
e="preserve">Cristina Lopez Aliaga (born 20 October 1982) is a Spanish water polo player.
She played at the 2007 World Aquatics Championships, 2009 World Aquatics Championships, 2008 Women's Water Polo World League, and 2009 Women's Water Polo World League.
On the club level, she played with Club Natació Sabadell, champion of Spain, in 2004, 2005, 2007 and 2009.
